Fabiol

Fabiol is an Antimicrobial additive for Polyurethanes.

Fabiol is an R&D product developed by IIT Delhi Researchers with an expertise in Textile Chemistry. The product is a completely "Research in India" & "Made In India" product which is thouroughly tested and optimized for performance.

What is Fabiol?

Fabiol is an Antimicrobial additive for Polyurethanes.

  • Using mattresses for a long-time creates smell and leads to rashes on skin. Mattresses in homes, hotels, hospitals and hospitality sector need to be Odour-free and hygienic.
  • Using Fabiol as an Antimicrobial additive during the foam manufacturing process imparts High-performance Anti-Odour functionality to the foam.
  • Reach out to us at: partner@fabiosys.com
Benefits

Benefits

Benefits of using Fabiol in your foam.

Anti-Odour for life

Regular use of mattresses develops foul odour which does not go away even after drying in sunlight. The odour comes back after every few days.

.

Using Fabiol in your mattresses provides High-performance Anti-Odour functionality, which stays till the life span of the foam.

Low Cost

Fabiol is very affordable compared to any other product in the market.

Tested & Certified

Fabiol has test reports from reputed labs for selling to Indian as well as International market.

Testimonials
